txt.en: As a Captain, Fate increases your Max Power and Out of Combat Power Regen.

• Class Difficulty: Moderate
  • Role: Support
  • Gameplay: Captains are armoured melee fighters and masters of buffing; skills that enhance allies. They may summon a Herald companion to fight by their side, ensuring they always have an ally to buff. They can also Mark foes, giving benefits to all who attack them. In fellowships, a Captain supports his allies with healing and buffs, while still dealing respectable damage.
  • Lore: The Captains of Middle-earth hold the future in their hands. By their own strength of arms and the inspiration they instill in others, they must lead the Free Peoples to victory. This class is inspired by Eärnur, last King of Gondor, who was revered both as a captain skilled in arms and as a lore-master.
As a Captain, Might increases your Physical and Tactical Mastery, Block Rating, Critical Rating, Physical and Tactical Mitigation, and Parry Rating.
As a Captain, Vitality increases your Maximum Morale and Morale Regen.
As a Captain, Agility increases your Critical Rating, Physical and Tactical Mastery, Finesse, and Parry Rating.
As a Captain, Will increases your Physical and Tactical Mitigation, Physical and Tactical Mastery, Finesse, and Resistance Rating.
